t: Shein Debuts Children’s Place Branded Storefront - Retail TouchPoints
s: October 30, 2024 - The Children’s Place has opened an online storefront on the China-direct app Shein, marking a significant step for both retailers. Shein opened its online marketplace to third-party sellers in May 2023, but until now most of those merchants have been China-based, non-branded manufacturers. The debut of a branded storefront from a well-known U.S. brand is new for Shein and comes right out of Amazon...
